name: Artisanal fisheries opportunity
description: The opportunity for artisanal and recreational fishing based on the quality of management of the small-scale fishing sector

name: Economic need for artisanal fishing
description: Per capita purchasing power parity (PPP) adjusted gross domestic product (GDP): GDPpcPPP as a proxy for subsistence fishing need

name: Ocean acidification
description: Ocean acidification pressure scaled using biological thresholds

name: Sea level rise
description: Sea level rise pressure

name: Sea surface temperature
description: Sea surface temperature anomalies

name: UV radiation
description: Modeled UV radiation

name: ISO country codes
description: Lookup table of country codes (based on ISO 3166 country codes) and Ocean Health Index region identifiers

name: Chemical pollution trend
description: Trends in chemical pollution, based on commercial shipping traffic, ports and harbors, land-based pesticide use (organic pollution), and urban runoff (inorganic pollution) within EEZ

name: Nutrient pollution trend
description: Trends in nutrient pollution, based on fertilizer consumption as a proxy for nutrient pollution

name: Pathogen pollution trend
description: Trends in percent of population without access to improved sanitation facilities as a proxy for pathogen pollution

name: Plastic trash trends
description: Trends in trash estimated using improperly disposed of plastics

name: Coastal protection weights
description: Habitat extent multiplied by habitat protection rank for: coral, mangrove (offshore and inland 1km), saltmarsh, sea ice (shoreline), and seagrass

name: Carbon storage weights
description: Habitat extent multiplied by carbon storage capacity for: mangrove, saltmarsh, and seagrass

name: Habitat weights
description: List of habitats in each region

name: B/Bmsy estimates
description: The ratio of fish population abundance compared to the abundance required to deliver maximum sustainable yield (RAM data and catch-MSY)

name: Fishery catch data
description: Mean commercial catch for each OHI region (averaged across years)

name: High bycatch due to artisanal fishing
description: Presence of destructive artisanal blast and poison (cyanide) fishing.

name: Low bycatch due to artisanal fishing
description: Extent of artisanal fishing (including: artisanal, subsistence, and recreational catch)

name: High bycatch due to commercial fishing
description: Modeled destructive commercial fishing practices by 5 gear types and scaled by Net Primary Productivity

name: Low bycatch due to commercial fishing
description: Modeled destructive commercial fishing practices by 2 gear types and scaled by Net Primary Productivity

name: Management of habitat to protect fisheries biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: habitat related questions

name: Commercial fishing management
description: Regulations and management of commerical fishing

name: Artisanal fisheries management effectiveness
description: Quality of management of small-scale fishing for artisanal and recreational purposes

name: Coastal protected marine areas (fishing preservation)
description: Protected marine areas within 3nm of coastline (lasting special places goal status score)

name: EEZ protected marine areas (fishing preservation)
description: Protected marine areas within EEZ (lasting special places calculation applied to the entire EEZ)

name: Targeted harvest of cetaceans and marine turtles
description: Targeted harvest of cetaceans and marine turtles

name: Food provision weights
description: Proportion of wild caught fisheries relative to total food production (e.g., fisheries and mariculture)

name: CITES signatories
description: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (CITES) signatories

name: Management of mariculture  to preserve biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: mariculture related questions

name: Mariculture Sustainability Index
description: Mariculture practice assessment criteria from the Mariculture Sustainability Index (MSI)

name: Management of tourism to preserve biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: tourism related questions

name: Habitat extent of coral
description: Area of coral habitat

name: Habitat condition of coral
description: Current condition of coral habitat relative to historical condition

name: Habitat condition trend of coral
description: Estimated change in coral condition

name: Habitat extent of mangrove
description: Area of mangrove habitat

name: Habitat condition of mangrove
description: Current condition of mangrove habitat relative to historical condition

name: Habitat condition trend of mangrove
description: Estimated change in mangrove condition

name: Habitat extent of rocky reef
description: Area of rocky reef habitat

name: Habitat extent of saltmarsh
description: Area of saltmarsh habitat

name: Habitat condition of saltmarsh
description: Current condition of saltmarsh habitat relative to historical condition

name: Habitat condition trend of saltmarsh
description: Estimated change in saltmarsh condition

name: Habitat extent of seagrass
description: Area of seagrass habitat

name: Habitat condition of seagrass
description: Current condition of seagrass habitat relative to historical condition

name: Habitat condition trend of seagrass
description: Estimated change in seagrass condition

name: Habitat extent of seaice
description: Area of seaice (edge and shoreline) habitat

name: Habitat condition of seaice
description: Current condition of seaice habitat relative to historical condition

name: Habitat condition trend of seaice
description: Estimated change in seaice condition

name: Habitat condition of softbottom
description: Current condition of softbottom habitat (trawling fishing pressure used as proxy)

name: Habitat condition trend of softbottom
description: Estimated change in softbottom condition

name: Management of habitat to protect habitat biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: habitat related questions

name: Intertidal habitat destruction
description: Coastal population density (25 mi from shore)  as a proxy for intertidal habitat destruction

name: Coastal protected marine areas (habitat preservation)
description: Protected marine areas within 3nm of coastline (lasting special places goal status score)

name: EEZ protected marine areas (habitat preservation)
description: Protected marine areas within EEZ (lasting special places calculation applied to the entire EEZ)

name: Subtidal hardbottom habitat destruction
description: High bycatch artisanal fishing practices (blast fishing) as a proxy for subtidal hard bottom habitat destruction

name: Subtidal soft bottom habitat destruction
description: Demersal destructive commercial fishing practices (i.e., trawling) in soft bottom habitat as a proxy for soft bottom habitat destruction

name: IUCN extinction risk
description: IUCN extinction risk category for iconic species located within each region

name: GDP
description: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) (adjustment for economies trend calculation)

name: GDP per capita PPP
description: Gross domestic product per person at purchasing power parity (correction for wage data across regions)

name: Adjustment factor for jobs (current)
description: Percent employment during the current status year for each sector/region (calculate livelihoods jobs status)

name: Jobs, most current value
description: Number of jobs in each sector and region for the most recent year of data (livelihoods status calculation)

name: Adjustment factor for jobs (reference)
description: Percent employment during the reference year (i.e., earliest year of data) for each sector/region (calculate livelihoods jobs status)

name: Jobs, reference value
description: Number of jobs in each sector and region for the reference year (earliest year of data for sector/region) of data (livelihoods status calculation)

name: Jobs for each sector and year
description: Number of jobs in each sector, region, and year. (livelihoods jobs trend calculation)

name: Total human population
description: Human population of OHI regions (used in livelihoods and economies goal to set values for regions with no humans)

name: Adjustment factor for revenue (current)
description: GDP during the current status year of each sector/region (World Bank) (calculate economies status)

name: Revenue, most current value
description: Revenue data for the most recent year of data (relative to the assessment year) for each sector/region (economies status calcuation)

name: Adjustment factor for revenue (reference)
description: GDP during the reference year (i.e., earliest year of data) of each sector/region (World Bank) (calculate economies status)

name: Revenue, reference value
description: Revenue data for the earliest year of each sector for each sector/region (economies status calculation)

name: Revenue for each sector and year
description: Revenue for each sector, region, and year (economies trend calculation)

name: Revenue adjustment (GDP)
description: GDP data used to adjust revenue values (within region sector weight for economies)

name: Sectors in each region
description: Proportion of jobs within each sector

name: Unemployment
description: Unemployment data from the World Bank (livelihoods jobs trend adjusment)

name: Adjustment factor for wages (current)
description: Values are 1, no subsequent adjustments were made to the wage data (calculate livelihoods wages)

name: Wages, current value
description: Wage data for the most recent year of data (relative to the assessment year) for each sector/region (livelihoods status calculation)

name: Adjustment factor for wages (reference)
description: Values are 1, no subsequent adjustments were made to the wage data (calculate livelihoods wages)

name: Wages, reference value
description: Wage data for the earliest year of data for each sector/region (livelihoods status calculation)

name: Wages for each sector and year
description: Wages for each sector, region, and year (livelihoods wage trend calculation)

name: Adjusted workforce size
description: Total labor force (number of people) from the World Bank  (within region sector weight for livelihoods)

name: Global Competitiveness Index (GCI) scores
description: Competitiveness in achieving sustained economic prosperity

name: Economic diversity
description: Sector evenness based on Shannon's Diversity Index calculated on the proportion of jobs in each sector as a measure of economic diversity

name: Inland coastal protected areas
description: Protected areas located 1 km inland

name: Offshore coastal protected areas
description: Protected areas located 3nm offshore

name: Inland coastal population
description: Total coastal population within 25 miles of coast

name: Mariculture harvest
description: Tonnes of mariculture harvest

name: Mariculture sustainability score
description: Mariculture sustainability based on the Mariculture Sustainability Index (MSI)

name: Areas of blast fishing
description: Destructive artisanal blast fishing

name: Areas of poison fishing
description: Destructive artisanal poison (cyanide) fishing

name: Relative harvest value
description: Relative importance of six marine commodities (coral, fish oil, seaweed and plants, shells, sponges, ornamental fish) within each region determined by dividing the max USD value (determined across most recent 10 years of data) of each product and dividing by the sum of the max USD values of all products

name: Natural product harvest
description: Yield in metric tonnes of six marine commodities (coral, fish oil, seaweed and plants, shells, sponges, ornamental fish)

name: Relative harvest tonnes
description: Tonnes of harvest of each commodity relative to maximum harvest (with 35% buffer) of the commodity within the region observed across years

name: Chemical pollution
description: Modeled chemical pollution within EEZ from commercial shipping traffic, ports and harbors, land-based pesticide use (organic pollution), and urban runoff (inorganic pollution)

name: Coastal chemical pollution
description: Modeled chemical pollution within 3nm of coastline from commercial shipping traffic, ports and harbors, land-based pesticide use (organic pollution), and urban runoff (inorganic pollution)

name: Nutrient pollution
description: Modeled nutrient pollution within 3nm of coastline based on fertilizer consumption

name: Coastal nutrient pollution
description: Modeled nutrient pollution within EEZ based on fertilizer consumption

name: Pathogen pollution
description: Percent of population without access to improved sanitation facilities as a proxy for pathogen pollution

name: Marine plastics
description: Global marine plastic pollution

name: Management of waters to preserve biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: tourism related questions

name: Social Progress Index
description: Social Progress Index scores

name: Region areas based on EEZ boundaries
description: Area of Ocean Health Index regions modified from exclusive economic zones

name: Inland area
description: Inland area of OHI regions within 1km of shoreline

name: Offshore area
description: Offshore area of OHI regions within 3nm of shoreline

name: UN geopolitical region classifications
description: UN geopolitical regions (3 levels), often used for gapfilling missing data

name: OHI regions
description: Subset of regions that are not deleted or disputed

name: Regions
description: Regions by type (eez, subocean, unclaimed)

name: Nonindigenous species
description: Measure of harmful invasive species

name: Management of nonindigenous species
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: invasive species related questions

name: Genetic escapes
description: Introduced mariculture species (Mariculture Sustainability Index) as a proxy for genetic escapes

name: Measure of coastal ecological integrity
description: Marine species condition (same calculation and data as the species subgoal status score)  calculated within 3 nm of shoreline as a proxy for ecological integrity

name: Measure of ecological integrity
description: Marine species condition (species subgoal status score) as a proxy for ecological integrity

name: Average species condition
description: Species condition based on average of IUCN threat categories

name: Average species condition trend
description: Species trends based on average of IUCN population trend data

name: Weakness of social progress
description: Inverse of Social Progress Index scores

name: Weakness of governance
description: Inverse of World Governance Indicators (WGI) six combined scores

name: Percent direct employment in tourism
description: Percent direct employment in tourism

name: Tourism sustainability index
description: Tourism Competitiveness Index (TTCI)

name: US State Department travel warnings
description: Countries with US State Department travel warnings

name: Strength of governance
description: World Governance Indicators (WGI) six combined scores

name: Habitat extent of softbottom
description: Area of softbottom habitat
